entity.name: Vitali Avagyan
entity.description: Creator and maintainer of Code-Graph-RAG, an open source tool for AI-powered codebase understanding via knowledge graphs.

projects.name: Code-Graph-RAG
projects.description: An open source retrieval-augmented generation system that analyzes multi-language codebases using Tree-sitter, builds comprehensive knowledge graphs, and enables natural language querying and editing of codebase structure and relationships. Supports 11 programming languages with a unified graph schema and functions as an MCP server for AI assistant integration.

plans.name: One-time donation
plans.description: Support Code-Graph-RAG development with a one-time contribution of any amount.

plans.name: Monthly supporter
plans.description: Recurring monthly support for ongoing development, security maintenance, and new language support.

plans.name: Annual sponsor
plans.description: Yearly sponsorship for sustained development of Code-Graph-RAG as open infrastructure for AI-powered codebase understanding.

history.description: Project launched in 2025. No external funding received.
